abstract: King Salman of Saudi Arabia quickly establishes chain of succession after death of King Abdullah, appointing his heir and heir to that heir as show of confidence in nation's future; analysts say kingdom nonetheless faces numerous pressures that ruling family has failed to address, like what to do with country's large and relatively uneducated youth population.
lead_paragraph: King Salman was speaking as regional leaders shifted their schedules to attend what news reports said would be a simple and traditional burial.
snippet: King Salman was speaking as regional leaders shifted their schedules to attend what news reports said would be a simple and traditional burial.

headline.main: Saudi Arabia’s Succession Line Is Set, but the Nation’s Path Remains Uncertain
headline.print_headline: Saudi Arabia’s Succession Line Is Set, but the Nation’s Path Remains Uncertain
